content: by midknight designs hugs n kisses dishcloth jennifer l christensen midknightstarr webs com midknightstarr@gmail com 1 hugs n kisses dishcloth materials  lily s sugar and cream 100% cotton worsted weight in cream a light blue b and delft blue c 1 ball each for tri-color or 1 ball of cream for single color or colors of your choice  size g hook  tapestry needle gauge gauge really isn t that important in this project stitches used chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet x-stitch x-st eyelet picot picot special stitches x-stitch x-st skip next stitch double_crochet in next stitch going back to skipped stitch yarn over crossing over stitch just made insert hook in skipped stitch yarn over draw through stitch complete stitch as a double_crochet x-stitch completed repeat as pattern indicates eyelet picot picot single_crochet in stitch indicated in pattern chain 3 slip_stitch into the side of single_crochet just made eyelet picot completed it s called eyelet picot because when completing the picot on top of the single_crochet the slip_stitch made on the side of the single_crochet opens the stitch up creating an eyelet 2 note instructions are for the 3 color dishcloth but it can be made with only 1 or 2 colors for 1 color work the same just don t break the yarn at the end of every row for 2 colors label colors just as a and b and alternate following the same directions instructions with color a chain 27 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across 26 single_crochet row 2 change to color b chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet chain 1 skip next single_crochet double_crochet in next 2 single_crochet chain 1 skip next single_crochet 7x s double_crochet in last 2 single_crochet 18 double_crochet 8 chain 1 spaces row 3 change to color a single_crochet in each double_crochet and chain 1 space across 26 single_crochet row 4 change to color c chain 3 counts 1st double_crochet x-st see special stitches above over the next 2 single_crochet 12x s double_crochet in last single_crochet 2 double_crochet 12 x-stitches row 5 repeat row 2 row 6-19 repeat row 2-5 do not finish off for edging chain 1 single_crochet in next 25 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next stitch for corner working along the side single_crochet 27 evenly hint 2 single_crochet per double_crochet post 1 single_crochet per single_crochet post in the starting chain 3 single_crochet in 1st free loop of starting chain single_crochet in next 24 free chain loops 3 single_crochet in last free chain loop working along the next side single_crochet 27 evenly 2 single_crochet in last single_crochet join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet do not finish off for eyelet picot edge chain 1 picot see special stitches above in same stitch as joining single_crochet in next single_crochet picot in next single_crochet repeat around slip_stitch in the single_crochet of the 1st picot finish off optional hanging loop before finishing chain 9 slip_stitch in corner of
